attributes.action: Urgently review legislation and reform current law on child abuse (Re: Baby P)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We demand our Government to urgently review and reform currently laws to enable swifter intervention in child abuse cases and appoint a government body to regulate and monitor all serious  cases so they are accountable to the public and Government.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
